trans-unit.source: Creates all child controls contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control in preparation for posting back to the server or rendering.
trans-unit.target: 建立 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項中所包含的所有子控制項，以準備回傳至伺服器或呈現。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.CreateChildControls%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: It prepares all connection-related objects needed for connections (for example, it retrieves the connection point objects from the available consumer and provider controls), and it creates the various user interface (UI) controls that users interact with in the connection UI to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 它會準備連接所需的所有與連接相關的物件 （例如，它會擷取連接點物件從可用的消費者和提供者控制項），並且建立與使用者互動的各種使用者介面 (UI) 控制項UI 來建立連接的連接。

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> object that enables a user to disconnect two connected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> 物件的參考，這個物件可讓使用者中斷兩個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之間的連接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" /> that disconnects two connected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> controls.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb" />，中斷兩個 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項之間的連接。

trans-unit.source: The disconnect verb, as used with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control, is a zone-level verb that appears in the connection user interface (UI) as part of the view in which users manage an existing connection between two controls.
trans-unit.target: 中斷連接動詞命令為搭配<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項，會出現在連接的使用者介面 (UI) 檢視的過程中哪些使用者管理兩個控制項之間的現有連接的區域層級動詞。

trans-unit.source: After users have clicked the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> connect verb on the verbs menu of a control, and the connection UI appears, if there is already a connection between two controls, the disconnect verb appears activated near the bottom of the UI.
trans-unit.target: 使用者已按下之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>連接控制項的動詞命令功能表上的動詞命令和 UI 隨即出現，如果已經有兩個控制項之間的連接的連接、 中斷連接的動詞命令顯示啟動 UI 底部附近。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.DisconnectVerb%2A> property to get a reference to the corresponding <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.DisconnectVerb%2A>屬性來取得對應的參考<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>UI 中的物件。

trans-unit.source: Although the property itself is read-only, after you have a reference to the verb, you can change its property values as needed.
trans-unit.target: 雖然本身的屬性是唯讀的之後您具有動詞命令的參考,，您可以視需要變更其屬性值。

trans-unit.source: You can set the property values of the disconnect verb declaratively, by declaring the `<disconnectverb>` element between the opening and closing tags of an `<asp:connectionszone>` element.
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由宣告，以宣告方式，設定中斷連接的動詞命令的屬性值`<disconnectverb>`開頭和結尾標記之間的項目`<asp:connectionszone>`項目。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the verb can also be set declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute in the form `Property-Subproperty`, where `Subproperty` is a property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb> object (for example, `DisconnectVerb-Text`).
trans-unit.target: 動詞命令的屬性也可以設定宣告的開頭標記內`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，在表單中加入屬性`Property-Subproperty`，其中`Subproperty`屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartVerb>物件 (例如， `DisconnectVerb-Text`)。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the properties programmatically in the form `Property.Subproperty` (for example, `DisconnectVerb.Text`).
trans-unit.target: 您也可以設定屬性以程式設計方式在表單中`Property.Subproperty`(例如， `DisconnectVerb.Text`)。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.DisconnectVerb%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.DisconnectVerb%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性之網頁其他兩個程式碼檔案所需執行此範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Obtain this code from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 包含的程式碼的郵遞區號介面，以及兩個原始程式檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制做為提供者和消費者連接。

trans-unit.source: Obtain this code from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `<asp:connectionszone>` element, and shows how to use the property declaratively and programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 網頁上裝載的控制項，宣告`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，並示範如何使用屬性，以宣告方式和程式設計的方式。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The Web page declares an `<asp:connectionszone>` element and, within the element tags, declares a `<disconnectverb>` element and sets some properties using attributes.
trans-unit.target: Web 網頁會宣告`<asp:connectionszone>`項目和項目標記中宣告`<disconnectverb>`項目，並設定一些使用屬性的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Also, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code sets some properties on the disconnect verb for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 此外，在`Page_PreRender`方法，此程式碼設定某些屬性上的中斷連線動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 載入瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control.
trans-unit.target: 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Provider** control, and click the connect verb.
trans-unit.target: 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號提供者**控制項，然後按一下連接的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: Note the effect of the property values that were set on the disconnect verb.
trans-unit.target: 請注意中斷連接的動詞命令所設定的屬性值的效果。

trans-unit.source: If you position your mouse pointer over the **End Connection** button, the custom description text appears in a ToolTip.
trans-unit.target: 如果您透過將滑鼠指標**結束連線**按鈕，自訂描述文字會出現在工具提示。

trans-unit.source: Click the **End Connection** button to disconnect the controls that are already connected due to the declarative connection on the page.
trans-unit.target: 按一下**結束連線**中斷連線的控制項已經連線因為頁面上的宣告式連接的按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone" /> control is currently displayed.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，其中該值指出目前是否顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone" /> is currently displayed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前顯示 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone" />，則為 <see langword="true" />；否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a text message that is displayed in an empty <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control if there are insufficient controls on a Web page to establish a connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果網頁上控制項不足，無法建立連接時，取得或設定空 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項中所顯示的文字訊息。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the message for an empty zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含空區域的訊息。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a message displayed in the connection user interface (UI) when there is an error or warning on an existing connection.
trans-unit.target: 當現有連接上有錯誤或警告時，取得或設定連接使用者介面 (UI) 中所顯示的訊息文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the text of the message.
trans-unit.target: 包含訊息文字的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text shown in the section of the connection user interface (UI) that precedes the named provider from which a consumer will retrieve data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定連接使用者介面 (UI) 區段中所顯示的文字，此文字位在消費者將從中擷取資料的具名提供者之前。

trans-unit.source: A string that prefaces the named provider that the consumer will get data from.
trans-unit.target: 在消費者將從中取得資料的具名提供者之前的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetFromText%2A> property takes effect in a specific connection scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetFromText%2A>屬性在特定連線的案例才會生效。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the connect verb on a consumer control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control displays a view that enables users to establish a connection to a provider.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下消費者控制項上的連接動詞命令<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者連接到提供者。

trans-unit.source: In the part of the UI that instructs users to choose a provider connection point, there is some text that precedes the drop-down list control in which users can select which connection point the consumer will get its data from.
trans-unit.target: 在點指示使用者選擇提供者連接的使用者介面部分，有一些可讓使用者選取取用者會從其資料的連接點的下拉式清單控制項之前的文字。

trans-unit.source: This text that precedes the drop-down control is the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetFromText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此下拉式清單控制項之前的文字是中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetFromText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the text value is **From**.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此文字值是**從**。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `GetFromText` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`GetFromText`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetFromText%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetFromText%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性之網頁其他兩個程式碼檔案所需執行此範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the providers section for the text that precedes the named provider.

trans-unit.source: This is the text assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetFromText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 這是指派給文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetFromText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text shown in the section of the connection user interface (UI) that precedes the named consumer that will receive data from a provider.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定連接使用者介面 (UI) 區段中所顯示的文字，此文字位在將從提供者接收資料的具名消費者之前。

trans-unit.source: In the part of the UI that instructs users to choose a provider connection point, there is some text that precedes the named consumer that will participate in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在點指示使用者選擇提供者連接的使用者介面部分，將連接加入具名的消費者之前一些文字。

trans-unit.source: This text that precedes the consumer is the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此文字前面取用者是中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.GetText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the text value is **Get**.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header text that appears at the top of the connection user interface (UI) created by the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定出現在 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項所建立之連接使用者介面 (UI) 頂端的標頭文字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the header text for the connection UI.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含連接 UI 的標頭文字。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: The text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.HeaderText%2A> property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.HeaderText%2A>顯示 UI 的連接時，會顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the connect verb on the verbs menu of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the connection UI appears, and the header text serves as a label at the very top of the connection UI.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制，UI 隨即出現的連線和標頭文字做為連接 UI 頂端的標籤。

trans-unit.source: The default text is **Connections Zone**.
trans-unit.target: 預設文字是**連接區域**。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone> class, so that the default connections zone header text can be assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.HeaderText%2A>屬性從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone>類別，以便可以指派給屬性的預設連接區域標頭文字。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `HeaderText` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`HeaderText`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: In the view that opens for the existing connection, note that the header text at the top of the connections zone is the value assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.HeaderText%2A> property in the code example.

trans-unit.source: Gets or set the text that is used for general instructions about the selected control in the section of the connection user interface (UI) for managing existing connections.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字，在管理現有連接之連接使用者介面 (UI) 區段中，選取之控制項的一般指示使用此文字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the instruction text for the connection UI.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含連接 UI 的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: The text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.InstructionText%2A> property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and a connection already exists.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.InstructionText%2A>屬性為可見，每當 UI 會顯示連線和連線已經存在。

trans-unit.source: Just below the header text (contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.HeaderText%2A> property), which is found at the top of the connection UI, is the instruction title, and just below that is the instruction text.
trans-unit.target: 正下方的頁首文字 (包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.HeaderText%2A>屬性)，位於頂端的 UI 中，連接是指示標題，而正下方的是 的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: The instruction text informs users what type of action can be performed on the currently selected <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control (the selected control is the one for which the user clicked a connect verb on the control's verbs menu).
trans-unit.target: 指示文字會告知使用者可以執行的動作類型在目前所選<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項 （選取的控制項是的一個使用者已按一下控制項的動詞命令功能表上的連接動詞命令）。

trans-unit.source: By default, the instruction text is **Manage the connections for the current Web part**.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，會指示文字**管理目前 Web 組件的連接**。

trans-unit.source: This property overrides the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone.InstructionText%2A> property from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class, so that the default connections zone instruction text can be assigned to the property.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會覆寫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone.InstructionText%2A>屬性從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>類別，以便預設連線區域文字可以指派給屬性的指示。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `InstructionText` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`InstructionText`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text that is used for a general description of the action that can be performed on the consumer or provider control, within the connection user interface (UI) for managing existing connections.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字，在管理現有連接的連接使用者介面 (UI) 中，對消費者或提供者控制項可執行之動作的一般描述會使用此文字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the instruction title for the connection UI.
trans-unit.target: 字串，包含連接 UI 的指示標題。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: The text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.InstructionTitle%2A> property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and a connection already exists.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.InstructionTitle%2A>屬性為可見，每當 UI 會顯示連線和連線已經存在。

trans-unit.source: The instruction title text is just below the header text (contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.HeaderText%2A> property), which is found at the top of the connection UI.
trans-unit.target: 指示標題文字是正下方的標頭文字 (包含在<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.HeaderText%2A>屬性)，位於連接 UI 的頂端。

trans-unit.source: The instruction title is a general description that informs users what type of action can be performed on the consumer or provider <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is participating in an existing connection.
trans-unit.target: 指示標題就會通知使用者可以取用者或提供者上執行的動作類型的一般描述<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>現有的連接正在參與的控制項。

trans-unit.source: By default, the instruction title begins with **Manage the connections for**, and ends with the name of the consumer or provider control that the user selected by clicking the connect verb on its verbs menu.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，指示標題開頭**管理連接**，並結束其動詞命令功能表上的連接動詞命令，即可選取的使用者取用者或提供者控制項的名稱。

trans-unit.source: When you assign a custom value to this property, remember that you cannot know at design time whether the user will select a provider or consumer control on which to manage the connection, so the custom instruction title must be general enough to refer to a consumer or a provider control.
trans-unit.target: 當您自訂的值指派給這個屬性時，請記住使用者會選取要管理的連接，因此自訂指示標題必須夠一般取用者或 pr 參考的提供者或消費者控制項是否無法知道您在設計階段ovider 控制項。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the default value of the property is rendered in such a way that it dynamically appends the name of whatever consumer or provider control that the user selects.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，屬性的預設值被轉譯的方式，動態附加使用者選取任何取用者或提供者控制項的名稱。

trans-unit.source: If you want to supply a custom value for the property that mimics this behavior, you must inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class, and override this property or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.RenderBody%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果您想要提供自訂的模擬此行為的屬性值，您必須繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別，並覆寫這個屬性或<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.RenderBody%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `InstructionTitle` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`InstructionTitle`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that represents the control state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，代表所要還原的控制項狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores control state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveControlState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveControlState" /> 方法所儲存的上一頁要求中，還原控制項狀態資訊。

trans-unit.source: When this method is invoked, it determines whether control state was previously saved for the control and, if so, sets the control state to the saved value.
trans-unit.target: 叫用這個方法時，它會判斷是否控制項狀態先前儲存的控制項，則如果是的話，設定控制項狀態的已儲存的值。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="savedState" /> does not equal the length of the array created by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveControlState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 的長度不等於 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveControlState" /> 方法所建立的陣列長度。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that contains the view state to be restored.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含所要還原的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: Restores view-state information from a previous page request that was saved by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: 將檢視狀態資訊從 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveViewState" /> 方法所儲存的上一個網頁要求還原。

trans-unit.source: This method is used primarily by the .NET Framework infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法主要供.NET Framework 基礎結構，並不是直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: However, control developers can override this method to specify how a custom server control restores its view state.
trans-unit.target: 不過，控制項開發人員可以覆寫這個方法，以指定自訂的伺服器控制項如何還原其檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET State Management Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 狀態管理概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/0218d965-5d30-445b-b6a6-8870e70e63ce)。

trans-unit.source: When this method is invoked, it determines whether view state was previously saved for the control and, if so, sets the view state to the saved value.
trans-unit.target: 叫用這個方法時，它會判斷是否檢視狀態先前儲存的控制項，則如果是的話，設定檢視狀態的已儲存的值。

trans-unit.source: The method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone.LoadViewState%2A> method inherited from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class, so that it can add to the base implementation and restore state for the several zone-level verbs used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 方法會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone.LoadViewState%2A>方法繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>類別，使其可以加入基底實作，然後還原中使用的數個區域層級動詞的狀態<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The length of <paramref name="savedState" /> does not equal the length of the array created by the <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveViewState" /> method.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="savedState" /> 的長度不等於 <see cref="M:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveViewState" /> 方法所建立的陣列長度。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text of a message displayed in the connection user interface (UI) when there is an error or warning on a new connection that a user tries to create.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者嘗試建立的新連接上有錯誤或警告時，取得或設定連接使用者介面 (UI) 中所顯示的訊息文字。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the text of the message.
trans-unit.target: 包含訊息文字的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instruction text that appears in the body of the connection user interface (UI) when a Web Parts control has no existing connection.
trans-unit.target: 當 Web 組件控制項沒有現有連接時，取得或設定在連接使用者介面 (UI) 主體中出現的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the text message for the case where there is no existing connection.
trans-unit.target: 在沒有現有連接的狀況下，包含文字訊息的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: The text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionInstructionText%2A> property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and no connection exists.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionInstructionText%2A>UI 會顯示連接，而且沒有連接存在時，會顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: After a user switches a page into connect display mode and clicks a connect verb on the verbs menu of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the main connection UI is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用者將頁面切換成連接顯示模式，然後按一下 連接上的動詞命令的動詞命令功能表之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，UI 會顯示主要的連線。

trans-unit.source: If there is no current connection, the text from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionInstructionText%2A> property is displayed near the bottom of the connection UI, just above the close verb in the zone's footer area.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有目前的連線，從文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionInstructionText%2A>屬性會顯示 UI，連接關閉的動詞命令區域的頁尾區域的正上方的底部附近。

trans-unit.source: The text describes the fact that there are no existing connections and gives users basic instructions for creating a connection within the UI.
trans-unit.target: 文字描述沒有任何現有連線的事實，並讓使用者建立連接，以在此 UI 中的基本指示。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `NoExistingConnectionInstructionText` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`NoExistingConnectionInstructionText`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionInstructionText%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionInstructionText%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性之網頁其他兩個程式碼檔案所需執行此範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Obtain this code from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 包含的程式碼的郵遞區號介面，以及兩個原始程式檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制做為提供者和消費者連接。

trans-unit.source: Obtain this code from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: A Web page that hosts all the controls, declares an `<asp:connectionszone>` element, and shows how to use the property programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 網頁上裝載的控制項，宣告`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The Web page declares an `<asp:connectionszone>` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionInstructionText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Web 網頁會宣告`<asp:connectionszone>`項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，該程式碼將值指派至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionInstructionText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 載入瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control.
trans-unit.target: 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb.
trans-unit.target: 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下連接的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: In the view that opens for the existing connection, click the **End Connection** button.
trans-unit.target: 在檢視中開啟現有的連接，按一下 [**結束連線**] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Note that the instruction text for no existing connections appears near the bottom of the connection UI, just above the close verb in the zone's footer area.
trans-unit.target: 請注意，沒有現有連接的指示文字出現在接近連接 UI，關閉的動詞命令區域的頁尾區域的正上方的底部。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title text that appears in the body of the connection user interface (UI) when a Web Parts control has no existing connection.
trans-unit.target: 當 Web 組件控制項沒有現有連接時，取得或設定在連接使用者介面 (UI) 主體中出現的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the title text for the case where there is no existing connection.
trans-unit.target: 在沒有現有連接的狀況下，包含標題文字的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: The text contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionTitle%2A> property is visible whenever the connection UI is displayed and no connection exists.
trans-unit.target: 中包含的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionTitle%2A>UI 會顯示連接，而且沒有連接存在時，會顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: After a user switches a page into connect display mode and clicks a connect verb on the verbs menu of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control, the main connection UI is displayed.
trans-unit.target: 使用者將頁面切換成連接顯示模式，然後按一下 連接上的動詞命令的動詞命令功能表之後<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制項，UI 會顯示主要的連線。

trans-unit.source: If there is no current connection, the text from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionTitle%2A> property is displayed near the top of the body of the connection UI, just below the link that users can click to create a new connection.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有目前的連線，從文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionTitle%2A>附近的正下方的連結，使用者可以按一下來建立新的連接在連接 UI 主體頂端的顯示屬性。

trans-unit.source: The title summarizes the fact that no connections exist, and the default title is **No active connections**.
trans-unit.target: 標題摘要說明的連接不存在，且預設標題**沒有作用中連線**。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `NoExistingConnectionTitle` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`NoExistingConnectionTitle`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionTitle%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.NoExistingConnectionTitle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.

trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Obtain this code from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.target: 包含的程式碼的郵遞區號介面，以及兩個原始程式檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制做為提供者和消費者連接。

trans-unit.target: 網頁上裝載的控制項，宣告`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser.

trans-unit.source: Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control.

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb.
trans-unit.target: 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下連接的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: In the view that opens for the existing connection, click the **End Connection** button.
trans-unit.target: 在檢視中開啟現有的連接，按一下 [**結束連線**] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: Note that the instruction title for no existing connections occurs just below the link that enables users to create a new connection.
trans-unit.target: 請注意沒有現有連接的指示標題正下方的連結，可讓使用者建立新的連接就會發生。

trans-unit.source: The sender of the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的傳送者。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartDisplayModeEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event and provides a custom handler for it.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged>事件，並提供自訂的處理常式。

trans-unit.source: After a Web page enters or exits the connect display mode, this method carries out several steps unique to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法網頁進入或離開連接顯示模式之後，執行幾個步驟的唯一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The method cancels any connection activity that is pending at this point, ensures that no child controls from the connection user interface (UI) are displayed by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A> property to `false`, and sets the connection UI to a mode in which it can display information about existing connections, if a user proceeds with the process of creating a connection.
trans-unit.target: 方法會取消暫止這個時候，可確保，從連接的使用者介面 (UI) 的任何子控制項的顯示設定的任何連接活動<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ChildControlsCreated%2A>屬性`false`，並設定連接 UI 中的模式如果使用者會繼續建立連接的程序時，就可以顯示現有的連線資訊。

trans-unit.source: To add specialized handling to the handling provided in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.OnDisplayModeChanged%2A> method, developers can inherit from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class and override this method.
trans-unit.target: 若要加入特殊的處理中提供的處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.OnDisplayModeChanged%2A>方法，開發人員可以繼承自<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別並覆寫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, developers can also provide a handler for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged> event on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> control by adding an `OnDisplayModeChanged` attribute to the `<asp:webpartmanager>` element in a Web page, and assigning to it the value of a custom method to handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 另外，開發人員也可以提供的處理常式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayModeChanged>事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>加控制`OnDisplayModeChanged`屬性`<asp:webpartmanager>`網頁，並指派給它的自訂方法來處理事件的值中的項目。

trans-unit.source: In this method, developers can check the current value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A> property, and if it is <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>, they can carry out the desired changes to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 在此方法中，開發人員可以簽入的目前值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.DisplayMode%2A>屬性，而且如果它是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.ConnectDisplayMode>，可以執行所需的變更至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: 包含事件資料的 <see cref="T:System.EventArgs" />。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Control.Init" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone.OnInit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, and adds custom handling to prepare the Web page to display the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone.OnInit%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，並將準備網頁上顯示的自訂處理<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Object" /> that identifies the sender of the event.
trans-unit.target: 識別事件傳送者的 <see cref="T:System.Object" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs" /> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartEventArgs" />，其中包含事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPartChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: This method overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> implementation to reset the connection user interface (UI) for the fact that the child controls will have to be recreated.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>為的子控制項都必須重新建立的事實重設連接的使用者介面 (UI) 的實作。

trans-unit.source: This is necessary because, when the selected control changes, several options in the connection UI will change, depending on whether the selected control is a consumer or provider, what connection points the controls has (the connection points are listed in drop-down list controls), and other details.
trans-unit.target: 這是必要的因為選取的控制項變更時，UI 會變更，請在連接中的數個選項根據選取的控制項是否取用者或提供者的連接點控制項具有 （連線點會列在下拉式清單控制項），以及其他詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of border that frames the server controls contained in a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定架構 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項中所包含之伺服器控制項的框線類型。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" /> that determines the type of border that frames the controls contained in the connections zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PartChromeType" />，決定架構連接區域中所包含之控制項的框線類型。

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性無法由佈景主題或樣式表主題設定。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>和[ASP.NET 佈景主題和面板](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5df3ebbd-d46c-4502-9406-02f9df4ef2c3)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the instructional text shown in the providers section of the connection user interface (UI), when a connection already exists.
trans-unit.target: 當連接已存在時，取得或設定連接使用者介面 (UI) 的提供者區段中所顯示的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: A string serving as the instructional text for providers participating in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 字串，做為參與連接之提供者的指示文字。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersInstructionText%2A> property takes effect in a specific connection scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersInstructionText%2A>屬性在特定連線的案例才會生效。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the connect verb on a consumer control, and a connection already exists, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control displays a view that enables users to disconnect the connection.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的取用者控制項，以及連線存在，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者中斷連線。

trans-unit.source: The view also shows any providers participating in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 檢視也會顯示參與連接任何提供者。

trans-unit.source: Just above the list of providers is the providers instruction text, which by default is more of a description of what provider controls do in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 正上方的提供者清單是提供者指示文字，其預設值是多個控制項提供者在連接中執行工作的描述。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `ProvidersInstructionText` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`ProvidersInstructionText`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersInstructionText%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersInstructionText%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性之網頁其他兩個程式碼檔案所需執行此範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Obtain this code from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 包含的程式碼的郵遞區號介面，以及兩個原始程式檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制做為提供者和消費者連接。

trans-unit.source: Obtain this code from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.target: 網頁上裝載的控制項，宣告`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The Web page declares an `<asp:connectionszone>` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersInstructionText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Web 網頁會宣告`<asp:connectionszone>`項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，該程式碼將值指派至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersInstructionText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 載入瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control.
trans-unit.target: 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb.
trans-unit.target: 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下連接的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the providers section for the custom text assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersInstructionText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在開啟的現有連接的檢視，查看指派給自訂文字，提供者區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersInstructionText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the title shown above the providers section of the connection user interface (UI), when a connection already exists.
trans-unit.target: 當連接已存在時，取得或設定連接使用者介面 (UI) 的提供者區段上方所顯示的標題。

trans-unit.source: A string serving as the title text for providers participating in a connection.
trans-unit.target: 字串，做為參與連接之提供者的標題文字。

trans-unit.source: The default title is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設標題。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A> property takes effect in a specific connection scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A>屬性在特定連線的案例才會生效。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the connect verb on a consumer control, and a connection already exists, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control displays a view that enables users to disconnect the connection.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的取用者控制項，以及連線存在，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者中斷連線。

trans-unit.source: The view also shows any providers participating in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 檢視也會顯示參與連接任何提供者。

trans-unit.source: Just above the list of providers is the providers instruction text, and above that is the title of the providers section, for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A> property supplies the text.
trans-unit.target: 只清單上方的提供者的提供者指示文字，而上方的標題的提供者 區段中，為其<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A>屬性提供的文字。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `ProvidersTitle` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`ProvidersTitle`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the use of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A> property with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A>屬性<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The example contains only the code for the Web page that demonstrates use of the property; for the other two code files needed to run the example, see the Example section of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 此範例僅包含程式碼示範如何使用屬性之網頁其他兩個程式碼檔案所需執行此範例，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: The code example has four parts:
trans-unit.target: 程式碼範例包含四個部分：

trans-unit.source: A user control that enables you to switch display modes on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 使用者控制項，可讓您在網頁上切換顯示模式。

trans-unit.source: Obtain this code from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.source: A source file that contains the code for a ZIP Code interface, and two <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> controls acting as the provider and the consumer for a connection.
trans-unit.target: 包含的程式碼的郵遞區號介面，以及兩個原始程式檔<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>控制做為提供者和消費者連接。

trans-unit.source: Obtain this code from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> class overview.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個程式碼從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>類別概觀。

trans-unit.target: 網頁上裝載的控制項，宣告`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，並示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: An explanation of how the example works in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。

trans-unit.source: The Web page declares an `<asp:connectionszone>` element and, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code assigns a value to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Web 網頁會宣告`<asp:connectionszone>`項目並在`Page_PreRender`方法，該程式碼將值指派至<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Load the page in a browser.
trans-unit.target: 載入瀏覽器中。

trans-unit.source: Switch to connect mode, using the **Display Mode** control.
trans-unit.target: 切換至連接模式中，使用**顯示模式**控制項。

trans-unit.source: Click the verbs menu arrow on the **ZIP Code Consumer** control, and click the connect verb.
trans-unit.target: 按一下動詞命令功能表箭頭**郵遞區號消費者**控制項，然後按一下連接的動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: In the view that opens for the existing connection, look in the providers section for the custom text assigned to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 在開啟的現有連接的檢視，查看指派給自訂文字，提供者區段<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.ProvidersTitle%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the argument data for the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含事件的引數資料。

trans-unit.source: Raises an event for the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control when the form that contains it posts back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 引發 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項的事件，當包含此控制項的表單回傳至伺服器之時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method handles the several possible outcomes that can occur when a form containing a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control is posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法會處理數個可能的結果時表單，其中包含可能發生的<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項回傳至伺服器。

trans-unit.source: First, if the value of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.WebPartToConnect%2A> property is `null`, there is no further connections-related action to take, so any pending connections are canceled and the method returns.
trans-unit.target: 首先，如果值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.WebPartToConnect%2A>屬性是`null`、 不沒有進行任何連線相關的動作，若要充分，因此任何暫止的連接會取消，而且方法會傳回。

trans-unit.source: Second, if the connection user interface (UI) is actually visible and the user is in the process of creating a connection, the method handles the possible scenarios: the user clicked a connect verb, the user clicked a disconnect verb, the transformer UI is being displayed, the zone is being closed, a connection to a provider is being created, or a connection to a consumer is being created.
trans-unit.target: 其次，如果連接使用者介面 (UI) 是實際上為可見，並且使用者正在建立連接，方法會處理可能的狀況： 使用者已按一下連接的動詞命令，使用者按一下 中斷連接的動詞命令，UI 正在轉換程式顯示，正在關閉區域、 建立提供者的連接時，或正在建立取用者的連接。

trans-unit.source: In each case, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.RaisePostBackEvent%2A> method takes the `eventArgument` parameter being passed and updates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 在每個案例中，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.RaisePostBackEvent%2A>方法會採用`eventArgument`傳遞的參數，並更新<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>據以控制。

trans-unit.source: Finally, if none of the above cases apply, the method calls the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class.
trans-unit.target: 最後，如果上述的情況下都不適用，方法會呼叫基底方法中<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>類別。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the Web Parts control content.
trans-unit.target: 接收 Web 組件控制項內容的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />。

trans-unit.source: Renders the contents of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項的內容呈現為指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.Render%2A> method updates the connection user interface (UI) with any changes that occurred since the child controls were created or during the prerendering stage, and then calls the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method to write the contents of the zone to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.Render%2A>方法來更新連接使用者介面 (UI) 的任何變更發生後所建立的子控制項，或預先呈現階段，然後再呼叫基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl.Render%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，將區域的內容寫入 Web 網頁.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the control's body content.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，收到控制項的主體內容。

trans-unit.source: Sends the content of a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control's body area to the specified <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> object, which writes the content to the Web page.
trans-unit.target: 將 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項的主體區域內容傳送至指定的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> 物件，再由此物件將內容寫入網頁。

trans-unit.source: The body of a Web Parts control is the portion between its header and footer areas.
trans-unit.target: Web 組件控制項的主體為其頁首和頁尾區域之間的部分。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.RenderBody%2A> method overrides the rendering of the body region that is done by the base <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderBody%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.RenderBody%2A>方法會覆寫的呈現方式，由基底的主體區域<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone.RenderBody%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: This method adds to the base rendering unique style attributes that apply to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control, and it also renders the appropriate content for the child controls in the connection user interface (UI), based on previous selections made by a user in the UI.
trans-unit.target: 此方法會將轉譯套用至唯一的樣式屬性的基底<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項，以及它也會呈現適當的內容的子控制項中連接的使用者介面 (UI)，根據先前在 UI 中的使用者所做的選取項目。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" /> that receives the content of the verbs to render in a connections zone.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter" />，接收要在連接區域中呈現的動詞命令內容。

trans-unit.source: Renders the zone-level verbs for a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control.
trans-unit.target: 呈現 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項的區域層次動詞命令。

trans-unit.source: This method renders the several zone-level verbs that are included with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呈現所包含的數個區域層級動詞<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: As a part of this method, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone.RenderVerb%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method is also called to render the individual details of each verb.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的一部分<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone.RenderVerb%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>也會呼叫方法來呈現每個動詞命令的個別詳細資料。

trans-unit.source: Saves any Web Parts control state changes that occurred since the last time the page was posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存從網頁上次回傳到伺服器以來所發生的任何 Web 組件控制項狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: Returns the Web Parts control's current state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 Web 組件控制項的目前狀態。

trans-unit.source: If no state is associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項關聯的狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control is visible in any of its modes except the mode that displays existing connections details, and if it has control state data about connection details associated with it, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveControlState%2A> method saves the data so that it can be persisted across round trips to the server.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項中會顯示任何其模式的模式，會顯示現有的連線詳細資料，但如果有與它相關聯的連接詳細資料的相關的控制項狀態資料<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveControlState%2A>方法將資料儲存，以便可以保存往返到伺服器。

trans-unit.source: Saves a <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control's view-state changes that occurred since the page was last posted back to the server.
trans-unit.target: 儲存自從網頁上次回傳至伺服器以來所發生的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項檢視狀態變更。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Object" /> containing the control's current view state.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.Object" />，包含控制項目前的檢視狀態。

trans-unit.source: If no view state is associated with the control, this method returns <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有與控制項關聯的檢視狀態，則這個方法會傳回 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: View state is the accumulation of the values of a Web Parts control's properties.
trans-unit.target: 檢視狀態是 Web 組件控制項的屬性值的累積。

trans-unit.source: These values are automatically placed in the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A> property, which is an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag> class.
trans-unit.target: 這些值會自動放入控制項的<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.ViewState%2A>屬性，這是執行個體的<xref:System.Web.UI.StateBag>類別。

trans-unit.source: This property's value is then persisted to a string object after the save state stage of the control's life cycle.
trans-unit.target: 儲存狀態控制項的生命週期的階段之後，這個屬性的值，然後會保存到字串物件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveViewState%2A> method adds to the base implementation the ability to save view state for the various verbs in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SaveViewState%2A>方法加入至基底實作以儲存檢視狀態中的各種動詞命令的能力<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text shown in the section of the connection user interface (UI) that precedes the named provider that will send data to a consumer.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定連接使用者介面 (UI) 區段中所顯示的文字，此文字位在將傳送資料至消費者的具名提供者之前。

trans-unit.source: A string that prefaces the named provider in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在連接之具名提供者之前的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SendText%2A> property takes effect in a specific connection scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SendText%2A>屬性在特定連線的案例才會生效。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control displays a view that enables users to establish a connection to a consumer.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令提供者的控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者建立取用者的連接。

trans-unit.source: In the part of the UI that instructs users to choose a consumer connection point, there is some text that precedes the named provider that will participate in the connection.
trans-unit.target: 在點指示使用者選擇的取用者連接的使用者介面部分，有一些具名的提供者要參與連線之前的文字。

trans-unit.source: This text that precedes the provider is the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SendText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此提供者之前的文字是中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SendText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the text value is **Send**.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此文字值是**傳送**。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `SendText` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`SendText`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the text shown in the section of the connection user interface (UI) that precedes the named consumer to which a provider will send data.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定連接使用者介面 (UI) 區段中所顯示的文字，此文字位在提供者將傳送資料至的具名消費者之前。

trans-unit.source: A string that prefaces the named consumer that the provider will send data to.
trans-unit.target: 在提供者將傳送資料至的具名消費者之前的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default text is a culture-specific string supplied by the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 會提供文化特性字串做為預設文字。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SendToText%2A> property takes effect in a specific connection scenario.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SendToText%2A>屬性在特定連線的案例才會生效。

trans-unit.source: When a user clicks the connect verb on a provider control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control displays a view that enables users to establish a connection to a consumer.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下 connect 上的動詞命令提供者的控制項，<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項顯示的檢視，可讓使用者建立取用者的連接。

trans-unit.source: In the part of the UI that instructs users to choose a consumer connection point, there is some text that precedes the drop-down list control in which users can select which connection point the provider will send its data to.
trans-unit.target: 在點指示使用者選擇的取用者連接的使用者介面部分，有一些可讓使用者選取的提供者會傳送至其資料的連接點的下拉式清單控制項之前的文字。

trans-unit.source: This text that precedes the drop-down control is the text in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SendToText%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此下拉式清單控制項之前的文字是中的文字<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.SendToText%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: By default, the text value is **To**.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，此文字值是**至**。

trans-unit.source: You can set the value of this property declaratively within the opening tag of the `<asp:connectionszone>` element, by adding an attribute named `SendToText` and assigning it a value.
trans-unit.target: 您可以設定的值，這個屬性的開頭標記中以宣告方式`<asp:connectionszone>`項目，加入名為屬性`SendToText`並指派其值。

trans-unit.source: You can also set the property value programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以透過程式設計方式設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Tracks view-state changes to the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> control so the changes can be stored in the control's <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 追蹤 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone" /> 控制項的檢視狀態變更，讓變更能夠儲存在控制項的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.StateBag" /> 物件中。

trans-unit.source: This method calls the base method in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone> class and also triggers view-state tracking for the verbs associated with a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone> control.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會呼叫基底方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZone>類別以及觸發程序檢視狀態相關聯的動詞命令的追蹤<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone>控制項。

trans-unit.source: Gets the currently selected <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control to connect to.
trans-unit.target: 取得目前選取的 <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項以連接。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> control.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart" /> 控制項。

trans-unit.source: When a user switches a Web page into connect display mode, and clicks the connect verb on the verbs menu of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart> control that is enabled for connections, the connection user interface (UI) opens, and the control is now referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.WebPartToConnect%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者 Web 網頁會切換成連接的顯示模式，並按一下 connect 上的動詞命令的動詞命令功能表<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart>啟用針對連接、 連接使用者介面 (UI) 隨即開啟和控制項的控制項現在正由<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.WebPartToConnect%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: The control referenced by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.WebPartToConnect%2A> property gets its value from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A> property of the current <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager> object.
trans-unit.target: 所參考的控制項<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConnectionsZone.WebPartToConnect%2A>屬性會取得其值從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager.SelectedWebPart%2A>屬性的目前<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartManager>物件。
